My Work

DevConnector - Social Network

This is a networking site I built using the core elements of web development: HTML, CSS, and vanilla Javascript. The backend is powered by Google Firebase. I learned a lot during this project utilizing technologies such as webpack, babel, and CSS loaders. A lot of the things I thought were specific to React, were actually just Javascript.

  • Javascript
  • Firebase
  • Webpack
  • Sass
  • CSS Loaders

    • Real Time Data


    • Not using a front end framework, such as React, makes it a little more difficult to refresh the page when data has changed. This app uses Firebase Real time database to circumvent this issue. Users can add past experiences and education, which update on the dashboard in real time.

    Custom Popup Box Class


    • Overlays the page to confirm an action. Here it is used to confirm the delete operation.
    • Utilizes CSS loaders to style the popup

    Firebase Authentication


    • Register as a user on the web app
    • Utilizes Firebase Authentication to track registerd users and when a given user is logged in

    View Profiles of Registered Users


    • Convenient link to easily view the profiles of fellow developers!

    View Profile Details


    Profile details page shows specifics of each user in a nicely formatted layout.

    Firestore Database

    Web Application utilizes the firestore database to experience, education, and in the future posts so users can communicate.
